subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey gave up only two runs despite allowing a career-high 13 hits, but his Mets teammates again could not hold up their end of the bargain as Max Scherzer pitched six scoreless innings.
snippet: Matt Harvey gave up only two runs despite allowing a career-high 13 hits, but his Mets teammates again could not hold up their end of the bargain as Max Scherzer pitched six scoreless innings.
